quote-text:
Whole clocks later, I pause to relish the feat,
to marvel at the way Iâve compromised the earth,
how Iâve been that kind of God for a minute.
But only time has moved.
Itâs like trying to reach the next world with a spoon.

My boy would have laughed.
Daddy, you better sit down and watch some ball game,
and weâd settle, Sunday lazy,
his squirm balanced on my belly.
